title: FATAL ERROR 0001
body: so when i start up league a pop up window appears and it says FATAL ERROR 0001, ive looked at the other answers for problems like this and they say to delete the folder titled in the mods subfolder "rds" but i dont have this folder, also someone said that you can delete system32 and fix it but i can delete it because its need some installers permissions or something, plox halp i just wanna play league and i have no idea where to go from here ;-;

replies.body:
Hey there,

First off, do NOT delete system32, this folder contains files critical to system functionality.

Could you try to [repair your client](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6) and let me know if that helps.

Yea it took a few goes but repairing it did the trick and ya i had a computer buddy tell me the same about system 32 so yea thanks league community .-. but its working now just starts of games are a bit funky but id say thats to do with my internet :)
